overview: Vienna is celebrating New Year’s Eve 1913/14.  It is the year, which will see the outbreak of the First World War.  In Hotel Sacher, the mood is excellent; and although the political atmosphere is charged, there’s an undercurrent of hate and intolerance in the air.  It is with this background that Nadja, a Russian spy, meets the Austrian civil servant Stefan.  He loves her, but comes under suspicion of being an agent because of this love.
title: Hotel Sacher
